sense.def:
To move or look along something
pomeni gibati se ali gledati proti enemu koncu tiste stvari.

seg.quote: He was driving along a lane.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
along a road, river, or corridor
, poteka vzdolž ceste, reke ali prehoda.

seg.quote: ...an old house along the Lanark Road.
Room 64 was half way along on the right.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
moves along
, se vztrajno premika.

seg.quote: I put my arm around him as we walked along.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is going along
na določen način, pomeni, da napreduje na tisti način.

To take someone along
pomeni nekoga vzeti s seboj, kadar nekam odhajamo.

seg.quote: Why don't you come along too?

sense.def:
Z izrazom
all along
povemo, da je nekaj obstajalo ali bilo resnično v določenem obdobju.

seg.quote: Perhaps they had been mistaken all along.

sense.def:
To do something along with someone else
pomeni narediti tisto skupaj z nekom.
To take one thing along with another
pomeni vzeti obe stvari hkrati.

seg.quote: Along with thousands of others, he fled the country.
The eggs were delivered along with the milk.
